channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Executions nearly double in 2025 due to dramatic rise in Florida
item.description: This year, 48 people are expected to be executed in the U.S. Meanwhile, fewer new death sentences are being issued, and public support for the death p...

item.title: Brian Walshe, who searched for crime tips online, is convicted of his wife's murder
item.description: Walshe said his wife left town for a work emergency in January 2023. Investigators found items like a hacksaw, bloody rugs and her COVID vaccine card ...

item.title: Trump says Rob Reiner had 'Trump Derangement Syndrome' in post on his death
item.description: Officials are investigating the death of the Hollywood director as a homicide.

item.title: Roomba maker files for bankruptcy, weighed down by debt and tariffs
item.description: iRobot, the U.S. firm that had robots vacuuming homes, will be taken over by its China-based supplier. It's assuring owners that devices will keep wor...

item.title: ACA shoppers face sticker shock as Congress dithers on health care
item.description: With subsidies that help consumers pay their health insurance premiums set to expire, health care shoppers face staggering prices. Lawmakers are runni...

item.title: Two victims named as hunt resumes for Brown University gunman
item.description: Two people died and nine others were injured in the attack in Rhode Island on Saturday.

item.title: An aspiring neurosurgeon and a campus Republican died in the Brown campus shooting
item.description: An aspiring neurosurgeon at Brown University and a leader of a campus Republicans group were in a study group preparing for an economics final, with t...

item.title: Search for the Brown University shooter resumes as questions swirl about campus security
What we know so far about the Brown University shooting
item.description: The investigation is ongoing and authorities are searching for additional video evidence that could help them track down the suspect.

item.title: What to know about the search for the Brown University shooting suspect
Nick Reiner, son of Rob Reiner and wife Michele, arrested for their murders
item.description: Nick Reiner, a son of director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele, has been arrested on murder charges following their deaths, police said.

item.title: Watch: Trump calls Rob Reiner "deranged" while taking questions a day after director's death
item.description: President Trump on Monday doubled down on his disparagement of actor and director Rob Reiner, a day after Reiner and his wife Michele were found dead ...

item.title: How Bondi's Hanukkah festival turned from joy to horror within minutes
item.description: Videos and eyewitness accounts reveal how Australia's worst mass shooting in nearly three decades unfolded.

item.title: How the Bondi Beach shooting unfolded
item.description: Eleven minutes of video capture the moment Bondi beach turns into a scene of horror. Eleven minutes of video capture the moment Bondi beach turns into...

item.title: Spotify says it's investigating after thousands of users report outages
item.description: Tens of thousands of Spotify users reported outages on Monday, with some saying they had lost access to their playlists.

item.title: Trump disparages Rob Reiner's political views a day after his murder
item.description: Actor and director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele were found dead in their Los Angeles home over the weekend.

item.title: Iranian Nobel laureate taken to hospital after 'violent arrest', family says
item.description: Narges Mohammadi told her family in a phone call that she was beaten on the head and neck by plainclothes agents in Mashhad last week.

item.title: Scottie Scheffler wins PGA Tour player of the year for 4th straight year
